ygData.messageBody:
Yeah well go to www.eqvault.com Abashi brushed us off yet again...

At least there will hopefully BE a developer working on tinkering to talk
to, and that he actually converses with us on how to bring about our ideas
to the light.

-----Original Message-----
From: jbuckingham@... [mailto:jbuckingham@...]
Sent: Sunday, August 27, 2000 4:01 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 308



> Do not create any MORE threads To this count there are 8 threads on the
front page, please keep 4-5 at the TOP

Under the new board rules, bumping multiple threads on the same topic to
the front page will get them deleted.

Better to keep it under one thread.
